Documentation

Learn how to build a website with boba!

Cards

Use cards to present information
Card Component
▼

	</div>

Images

Add an image to your card using .card-image
Card Component

Action 1
Action 2 
<div class="card">
	<div class="card-header">
		<div class="card-header-title">
			Card Component
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="card-image">
		<img src="https://placeholdit.imgix.net/~text?txtsize=33&txt=350%C3%97150&w=500&h=300" alt="Image">
	</div>
	<div class="card-content">
		<p>
		Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Modifiers

Change the layout of your card with ease

Borderless Header

Remove the border around the card-heading with the .borderless class
Card Component

Excepteur sint occaecat containeridatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

Action 1
Action 2

	<div class="card-header borderless">
		<div class="card-header-title">
			Card Component
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="card-content">
		<p>
		Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. No Top Padding

Remove the padding between a .borderless card-header and card-content using the .no-top-padding class
Card Component

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat containeridatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

Action 1
Action 2 
<div class="card">
	<div class="card-header borderless">
		<div class="card-header-title">
			Card Component
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="card-content no-top-padding">
		<p>
		Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat containeridatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
		</p>
	</div>
	<div class="card-footer">
		<div class="card-footer-item">
			<span>Action 1</span>
		</div>
		<div class="card-footer-item">
			<span>Action 2</span>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>

Footer Alignment

By default, card-footer items are center-aligned

Align Items Left

Align footer items to the left of the card using the .align-items-left class
Card Component

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat containeridatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.

Action 1
Action 2 
<div class="card">
	<div class="card-header">
		<div class="card-header-title">
			Card Component
		</div>
	</div>
	<div class="card-content">
		<p>
		Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit, sed do eiusmod tempor incididunt ut labore et dolore magna aliqua. Ut enim ad minim veniam, quis nostrud exercitation ullamco laboris nisi ut aliquip ex ea commodo consequat. Duis aute irure dolor in reprehenderit in voluptate velit esse cillum dolore eu fugiat nulla pariatur. Excepteur sint occaecat containeridatat non proident, sunt in culpa qui officia deserunt mollit anim id est laborum.
		</p>
	</div>
	<div class="card-footer align-items-left">
		<div class="card-footer-item">
			<span>Action 1</span>
		</div>
		<div class="card-footer-item">
			<span>Action 2</span>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
